text: Share Tweet Email Copy Link Copied Bachelor in Paradise stars Carly Waddell and Jade Roper shared glimpses of their joint baby photoshoot, and it is so cute! Everyone needs to check it out. Waddell and Roper did a photoshoot with both of their baby girls over the weekend and the results are adorable. The friends each shared some behind the scenes pictures of them with their little girls, Isabella and Emerson, as well as Waddell ’ s husband Evan Bass via Instagram Story. ` ` So Carly and I are doing a photo shoot with Emerson and Bella today, ” shared Roper.
